mapper.sql:
where deleted = 0
and name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
and url like CONCAT('%', #{url}, '%')
and parentId = #{parentId}
and parentId is null or parentId = ''
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{createTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and rank = #{rank}
and actions like CONCAT('%', #{actions}, '%')
mapper.select: select max(rank+1) as rank from sys_menu
mapper.update:
update sys_menu set updateTime=now(),
name=#{name},
url=#{url},
parentId=#{parentId},
deleted=#{deleted},
rank=#{rank},
actions=#{actions},
update_by=#{updateBy},
where id=#{id}
update sys_menu set deleted=1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select from sys_menu where deleted= 0 order by rank desc
